name: CSS Vari
format:
<style>
    @font-face {
        font-family: "DSR";    
        src: url(/fonts/DancingScript-Regular.ttf);
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "DSM";    
        src: url(/fonts/DancingScript-Medium.ttf);
    }
    .md-toolbar-tools{
        background-color:rgb(255,165,0);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-thumb{
        background-color:rgba(255,165,0) !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button{
        background-color:rgb(255,165,0) !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-sign{
        background-color:rgb(255,165,0) !important;
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme{
        font-family: "DSM";    
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content{
        background-color:white;
    }
    p{
        font-family:"DSR";
    }
    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel > p{ /*titoli pannelli di tutte le schede*/
        font-family: "DSM";
        font-size: 24px;*/
    }
    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle{/*Titoli Scheda*/
        font-family:"DSM";
    }
    .puls{
        font-family:"DSM";
    }
    .fa:before {
        text-shadow:0 0 0 gray;
    }
</style>
